effect.short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by one stage.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by one stage.

flavorTexts.text:
The user attacks by breathing a special, hot fire.
This also lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.
